text: The European Confederation of Roller Skating (Confédération Européenne de Roller Skating, or CERS) was the main European roller skating organization. The CERS was part of the International Roller Sports Federation or FIRS. Varieties of skating governed by the CERS included: *Inline Downhill *Roller Hockey, by CERS–RH *Inline hockey *Speedskating ==Other websites== *Official Website: en.cerskating.eu Rol Category:Roller skating organizations Category:Organizations based in Portugal
title: European Confederation of Roller Skating
